story_arc: promise → course → data-staircase → pro/con → verdict → alternatives

primary_trope.name: tier_reveal
primary_trope.hook_text: 328 races. 14 dimensions. Where does Rose City Rampage Gravel Race land?
primary_trope.mechanism: Countdown / ranking — inherent escalation and social comparison.

beats.label: HOOK + PROMISE
beats.narration: Should you race Rose City Rampage Gravel Race? I rated 328 gravel races on 14 dimensions. Rose City Rampage Gravel Race scored 37 out of 100. Grassroots tier. Here's what that actually means for your season.
beats.text_on_screen: Should You Race Rose City Rampage Gravel Race?

broll_sources.query: Rose City Rampage Gravel Race gravel race
Rose City Rampage Gravel Race cycling 2026

beats.editing_note: STATE THE PREMISE IN 8 SECONDS. Clear value prop: 'I rated 328 races. Here's where this one lands.' This is the 8-second decision window. Viewers who stay past 15s are 58% more likely to finish.
beats.psych_mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) + IKEA effect (viewer predicts the tier before reveal).

beats.label: THE COURSE
beats.narration: Rose City Rampage Gravel Race. Thomasville, GA. 55 mi. Georgia plains gravel.
beats.text_on_screen: Rose City Rampage Gravel Race | Thomasville, GA | 55 mi

broll_sources.query: Rose City Rampage Gravel Race route map
Rose City Rampage Gravel Race course walkthrough

beats.editing_note: Let the course breathe. Show the route map, then cut to terrain-specific B-roll. This is the SETUP phase — grounding the viewer before the data analysis. Pacing: 25-40 sec cuts.

beats.label: THE SCORES — Top 8
beats.narration: Let's go through the scores. Value. 3 out of 5. Fair value. You get what you pay for. Jason notes that 'no one is getting rich or retiring off race revenue' while costs hit all-time highs. Expenses. 3 out of 5. Standard gravel race budget. Logistics. 2 out of 5. You'll figure it out. Eventually. Chainbuster Racing cancelled the 2025 edition due to just 18 registrants, citing market saturation with three events in the same area within three months. Length. 2 out of 5. Manageable distance. Back by lunch. Technicality. 2 out of 5. Some chunky bits. Nothing catastrophic. 2000 feet over 55 miles suggests rolling Georgia terrain rather than technical challenges. Climate. 2 out of 5. Weather cooperates more often than not. Historical weather data shows average highs of 75°F and lows of 55°F, with a 41% chance of rain on any given day. Adventure. 2 out of 5. Mild adventure. Scenic ride with a number plate. The biggest adventure was whether the race would happen—it didn't in 2025. Race Quality. 2 out of 5. Adequate. Room for improvement. Race quality centers on what Jason calls 'the joy of community and camaraderie' rather than polished production values.
beats.editing_note: PROGRESSIVE RHYTHM: start tight (15-20 sec per dimension), slow down for the most interesting scores (30-40 sec). Each score: number appears, brief pause, explanation. Avatar reacts to extreme scores (5/5 = chef_kiss, 1/5 = facepalm). RE-ENGAGEMENT at 3:00 mark: insert a surprising score reveal or a meme reaction to break the pattern.

meme_insert.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

beats.label: THE SCORES — Also Scored
beats.narration: The remaining six. Quick-fire. Experience. 2 out of 5. Pleasant enough. Won't change your life. Community. 2 out of 5. Polite. Not exactly warm. Elevation. 1 out of 5. Flat. Your climbing legs get a rest day. Altitude. 1 out of 5. Sea level. Your lungs get a day off. Prestige. 1 out of 5. Zero name recognition. Field Depth. 1 out of 5. Not exactly stacked.
beats.editing_note: FAST PACING — 7 seconds per dimension. Quick-fire energy change from the deep analysis above. This is a PATTERN INTERRUPT through pacing shift.

beats.label: LOGISTICS
beats.narration: The logistics. What you actually need to know.

broll_sources.query: Rose City Rampage Gravel Race race day

beats.editing_note: Utility section. Lower energy, practical value. Hybrid Tempo: alternate fast logistics items (10-15 sec) with slow map visuals (30 sec).

logistics: Lodging: Thomasville has limited lodging. Plan ahead.

beats.label: VERDICT
beats.narration: Verdict: Georgia Plains Gravel. If you're local to GA/Southeast. yes, it's solid. If you're traveling. skip it.
beats.editing_note: CLOSE THE MAIN LOOP. 0.5s silence before verdict. Tier badge slams in. Avatar delivers final take. DO NOT signal 'wrapping up' — maintain energy.

beats.label: ALTERNATIVES
beats.narration: If Rose City Rampage Gravel Race isn't quite right for you. For better GA races: Cohutta Gravel Grinder, Southern Cross.
beats.editing_note: Bonus value — viewers who reach this point are highly engaged. Cross-reference other videos/races.

beats.label: CTA
beats.narration: Full breakdown on the site. Fourteen scored dimensions. Free race prep kit. Link in the description.
beats.editing_note: End ABRUPTLY after CTA. No 'thanks for watching' wind-down.
beats.engagement_question: Have you raced Rose City Rampage Gravel Race? Did we get the score right? Drop it in the comments.
